taskDescription: You want to fill gift bags for children in the after-school program where you volunteer. You have 30 crayons, 20 sticker sheets, and 70 bite-sized candies. If each gift bag must contain the same number of crayons, sticker sheets, and bite-sized candies, what is the maximum number of bags that can be filled?
detailedSolution: The maximum number of bags that can be filled in this way is 10.
